video_prompt: Waves consistently break on a sandy shore. The ocean’s color subtly shifts from turquoise to deep blue. Fluffy white clouds drift across a bright blue sky. Tree foliage gently sways.
image_prompt: Vibrant vertical digital artwork of a colorful beachside scene. A rustic brown wooden building with a blue and white striped awning, Chinese characters sign, and abundant potted flowers stands on the sand in the upper left. A lush green tree is to its right, under a bright blue sky with fluffy white clouds. A wooden pier stretches over a turquoise ocean with foamy waves. In the lower right, a beautiful cherry blossom tree with pink flowers. The style is crisp, saturated, and idyllic.
refined_video_prompt: Waves consistently break along the shore. The ocean's hue subtly shifts from turquoise to deep blue. Clouds drift across the sky. Tree foliage gently sways.
